messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] dogs vs religion
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/20/02 4:28:18 PM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/20/02 4:28:18 PM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< This one's just geting old, and I think it's made the circuit more than
once
(kind of like every six months or so it 's either here or on the message
boards. Maybe these folks are new and aren't saturated yet! <g> >>

There are new homeschoolers every day, and there's always some percentage of
them who have been told and so they're sure that we all MUST join HSLDA, and
that Christian homeschoolers invented homeschooling and made it legal in 50
states, and sometimes a few who express puzzlement about why anyone would
CHOOSE to homeschool if the lord hadn't commanded them to.

This comes up the same way how will they get into college what about algebra
what about socialization and will they ever read come up.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] dogs vs religion
messages.msgSnippet: ... Whew!  That s a relief! I have a dog question and if you re too young to know the answer I don t want to hear about it.  What kind of dog was Spot?
messages.messageBody:
On Sun, 20 Oct 2002 18:28:28 EDT kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> Absolutely not. I can get into dog talk! <G> I'm the
> groomer/trainer/judge!

Whew! That's a relief!<g>

I have a dog question and if you're too young to know the answer I don't
want to hear about it.<g> What kind of dog was Spot? The Dick and Jane
Spot. He was some kind of Spaniel I think, black and white but I don't
have a picture and I can't remember what he was. My son has been asking
since I told him about those old Dick and Jane books. He would need to
know the breed of their dog.
Come Kelly. Come and see. Come, come. Come and see. Come and see
Spot.

Deb L

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] dogs vs religion
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/20/2002 5:47:56 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Absolutely not. I can get into dog talk!  I m the groomer/trainer/judge! This one s just
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/20/2002 5:47:56 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Are you the same poster who didn't like the dog topic a while back? <g>
>
Absolutely not. I can get into dog talk! <G> I'm the groomer/trainer/judge!

This one's just geting old, and I think it's made the circuit more than once
(kind of like every six months or so it 's either here or on the message
boards. Maybe these folks are new and aren't saturated yet! <g>

Kelly
